subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: J. R. Smith, winner of the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man of the Year award, has shot poorly in the Knicks-Pacers series, but showed signs of returning to form in Game 5.
snippet: J. R. Smith, winner of the N.B.A.’s Sixth Man of the Year award, has shot poorly in the Knicks-Pacers series, but showed signs of returning to form in Game 5.
